incident_updates.body:
• 2013-01-24 21:47:49 - Were currently experiencing degraded search performance. Were working to resolve the issue.
  • 2013-01-24 21:53:13 - Search is currently unavailable. An update will be provided once service has been restored.
  • 2013-01-24 23:52:52 - We continue our work to restore access to search. Updates will be provided as we progress.
  • 2013-01-25 02:15:43 - Search remains unavailable. The cluster is recovering slowly and we continue to monitor its progress. Well provide further updates as they become available.
  • 2013-01-25 15:23:41 - we are looking into issues accessing some GitHub Pages.
  • 2013-01-25 15:43:23 - GitHub Pages issues have been resolved. We are continuing to work on Search.
  • 2013-01-25 15:54:08 - The search cluster has recovered, but we are keeping it offline while we perform some additional maintenance. We will provide additional updates as we have more information to share.
  • 2013-01-25 16:05:35 - We are investigating availability issues with a subset of GitHub Pages.
  • 2013-01-25 16:20:26 - Access to GitHub Pages has been restored.
  • 2013-01-25 16:38:07 - The search cluster has recovered, but we are keeping it offline while we perform some additional maintenance. We will provide additional updates as we have more information to share.
  • 2013-01-26 01:10:45 - We have re-enabled the code search cluster. A small percentage of code is currently missing from search results as we backfill it into the cluster again. New code pushes are updating our indexes normally. We will be posting a post-mortem on the GitHub blog next week with further details.

components.name: Git Operations
components.description: Performance of git clones, pulls, pushes, and associated operations

components.name: Pages
components.description: Frontend application and API servers for Pages builds
